using namespace std;

int ipow(int base, int exp)
{
    int result = 1;
    while (exp)
    {
        if (exp & 1)
            result *= base;
        exp >>= 1;
        base *= base;
    }

    return result;
}

int main()
{
	long long int  t, n, reslt;
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	while (t--) {
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		if (n == 1) {
			reslt = 0;
		} else if (n % 2 == 0) {
			reslt = (n*n / 2) - 1;
		} else {
			reslt = (n * n - 3)/ 2;
		}
		//reslt = (n * (n - 1)) / 2;
		printf("%lld\n", reslt);
	}
	return 0;
	
}
